review: I love this technology and so inexpensive.

review: It casts youtube to your tv fast and stable. probably one of the best buy in 2014.

review: Works as advertised.  Product description could be improved by saying what is in the box.

review: ABSOLUTELY love this device. I don't have cable in my bedroom so I use my Chromecast almost daily

review: Quite frankly one of the best products Google has ever made.

review: An awesome addition to a slightly older TV we have with no internet. My toddler loves to watch his favorite shows and videos from the computer or my phone on the "big TV". Great for watching Netflix,Hulu or viewing pictures on a larger screen.
author: NickRick
